properties.tree_description:
Large declining pignut hickory near multiple high value targets.Reason for Removal:Dying treeComments:Canopy is rapidly declining with dieback progressing in the last 3-4 weeks; bark beetle entry points and fungal fruiting body are visible at base of trunk on south side; area of dead wood detected between these two locations.  Multiple high value targets in area - multifamily residential building, shared drive and parking; arterial road with frequent emergency access, and three phase overhead power.
